001package edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.dao;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.model.entity.Channel;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.chat.model.entity.Message;
005import java.time.Instant;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Optional;
008import org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable;
009import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;
010import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Query;
011
012public interface MessageRepository extends JpaRepository<Message, Long> {
013
014  String LATEST_POSTED_QUERY = """
015      SELECT
016        m.posted
017      FROM
018        Message AS m
019      WHERE
020        m.channel = :channel
021        AND m.posted > :posted
022      ORDER BY
023        m.posted ASC
024      """;
025
026  List<Message> getAllByChannelAndPostedAfterOrderByPostedAsc(Channel channel, Instant posted);
027
028  @Query(LATEST_POSTED_QUERY)
029  List<Instant> getLastPostedByChannelAndPostedAfter(
030      Channel channel, Instant posted, Pageable pageable);
031
032}
